Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the data used by the BorschtBreakers Application.
    Version:
    2.0, June 10 2013
    Author:
    Richard shi

        public void loadLesson(java.lang.String lessonDefFileName)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads Lessons from Lesson Def file.

        Local Variable dictionary:

        lessonData: Reference variable for LessonData. Holds the Lessons Data.

        lessonFilePath: Reference variable for String. Holds the Lesson files path.

        Parameters:
        lessonDefFileName - Reference variable for String. Holds Lesson Definition File Filename.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if any errors occur.
